data.title: Bickenbach (Bergstr) → Mannheim by Train
data.meta_description: Travel by train from Bickenbach (Bergstr) to Mannheim in 44m. Get train times, compare prices & buy cheap train tickets for Bickenbach (Bergstr) to Mannheim today.
data.text:
Looking to travel from Bickenbach (Bergstr) to Mannheim by train? You've come to the right place!

On average, it takes around 55 minutes to travel from Bickenbach (Bergstr) to Mannheim by train, the fastest services can get you there in as little as 44 minutes though. You'll usually find 21 trains per day running along the 20 miles (33 km) route between these two destinations. Once you're onboard, you can sit back and relax, as you won’t need to make any changes on your way to Mannheim. You'll probably be hopping onto a DB train to get to Mannheim, as they are the main operators of services on this route.

Plan your trip ahead and book your train tickets in advance if you want to snap up the cheapest fares. Just start a search in our Journey Planner to view the latest prices for trains from Bickenbach (Bergstr) to Mannheim.

If you’re feeling ready to book, start looking for cheap train tickets with us today. Keep reading for more information on the journey to Mannheim by train, including our timetable where you can view first and last train times.
